paintBorder(Component, Graphics, int, int, int, int) - Method in class UI.Custom.RoundedCornerBorder
 
parseJSON(String, String) - Static method in class pengu.messenger.APICommunicator
Parses JSON text, allows for value at a specified key to be retrieved.
parseJSONArray(String) - Static method in class pengu.messenger.APICommunicator
Parses a JSOn array, by converting each item in the array to a String representation.
pengu.database - package pengu.database
This package provides the classes required for database transactions for Pengu Messenger.
pengu.messenger - package pengu.messenger
This package provides the Working classes for Pengu Messenger.
PenguAccessDBCommunicator - Class in pengu.database
This class allows for the communication of MS Access files to be made.
PenguAccessDBCommunicator(String) - Constructor for class pengu.database.PenguAccessDBCommunicator
Parameterized constructor method.
PenguAESEncryption - Class in pengusecurity.encrypt
This class Allows for the generation of AES keys, encryption and decryption using the AES keys, and the exporting and importing of AES keys as Base64 Strings
PenguAESEncryption() - Constructor for class pengusecurity.encrypt.PenguAESEncryption
Default constructor method, also generates a new AES key.
PenguAESEncryption(String) - Constructor for class pengusecurity.encrypt.PenguAESEncryption
Parameterized constructor, receives a Base64 encoded String that contains the AES key and the IV separated by a '#'.
PenguEncryptedMessage - Class in pengusecurity.encrypt
This class combines the AES encryption and RSA encryption classes to encrypt and decrypt messages of varying sizes.
PenguEncryptedMessage() - Constructor for class pengusecurity.encrypt.PenguEncryptedMessage
Default constructor method.
PenguEncryptedMessage(String) - Constructor for class pengusecurity.encrypt.PenguEncryptedMessage
Parameterized constructor method that receives an encrypted message string.
PenguKeyPair - Class in pengusecurity.encrypt
This class Allows for the generation of RSA (public and private) key pairs, encryption and decryption using the RSA key pairs, and the exporting and importing of RSA key pairs as Base64 Strings
PenguKeyPair() - Constructor for class pengusecurity.encrypt.PenguKeyPair
Default constructor method, also generates a new RSA key pair.
PenguKeyPair(String) - Constructor for class pengusecurity.encrypt.PenguKeyPair
Parameterized constructor method that receives a Base64 encoded RSA private key String.
PenguKeyPair(String, boolean) - Constructor for class pengusecurity.encrypt.PenguKeyPair
Parameterized constructor method that receives a Base64 encoded RSA private or public key String.
PenguKeyPair(String, String) - Constructor for class pengusecurity.encrypt.PenguKeyPair
Parameterized constructor method that receives two Base64 encoded Strings - the public key String and the private key String.
PenguMessage - Class in pengu.messenger
This class is used to differ service-sent messages, from user-sent messages
PenguMessage(String) - Constructor for class pengu.messenger.PenguMessage
Parameterized constructor method, that receives an un-parsed JSON String and then creates a JSON Object.
PenguMessage(String, PenguMessage.ContentItem[]) - Constructor for class pengu.messenger.PenguMessage
Parameterized constructor method, that receives a message type String, and an array of Content Items, then makes a JSON Object and JSON String of the message.
PenguMessage.ContentItem - Class in pengu.messenger
This class is used to store a message's content, and the type of the content.
PenguMessenger - Class in pengu.messenger
This is the main class for the Pengu Messenger application.
PenguMessenger() - Constructor for class pengu.messenger.PenguMessenger
 
PenguMessengerClient - Class in pengu.messenger
This class provides all the methods necessary for the Pengu Messenger application.
PenguMessengerClient() - Constructor for class pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerClient
Default Constructor method.
PenguMessengerClient.ActiveChatItem - Class in pengu.messenger
This class allows for active chat objects to be created so that active chat information can be stored in an array.
PenguMessengerClient.ContactItem - Class in pengu.messenger
This class allows for contact objects to be created so that contacts information can be stored in an array.
PenguMessengerClient.ContactType - Class in pengu.messenger
This class allows for Contact Type(Groups) Objects to be created so that they and their properties can be stored in an array with other Contact Types.
PenguMessengerClient.Message - Class in pengu.messenger
This class allows for Message objects to be created so that messages can be stored in an array.
PenguMessengerClient.PrivateKeyLink - Class in pengu.messenger
This class is used to link a private key to a public key (or public key hash).
PenguMessengerClient.SentMessage - Class in pengu.messenger
This class allows for Message objects to be created so that messages can be stored in an array.
PenguMessengerClient.ServerProblemException - Exception in pengu.messenger
Exception class for any server related problem, excluding Forbidden and BadRequest
PenguMessengerRESTClient - Class in pengu.messenger
This class provides the methods necessary for communicating with the Pengu Messenger (PENGU) API Server.
PenguMessengerRESTClient() - Constructor for class pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerRESTClient
Default constructor method.
PenguMessengerRESTClient.Message - Class in pengu.messenger
This class extend the MessageReference class by adding a field for message content.
PenguMessengerRESTClient.MessageReference - Class in pengu.messenger
This class allows for MessageReference objects to be created, it links a message reference to a sender and size.
PenguMessengerRESTClient.PublicKey - Class in pengu.messenger
This class allows for a public key object to be created to link a public key String to a username, expiry date and registration date.
PenguRESTClient - Class in pengu.messenger
This class is used when wanting to communicate with any Pengu API server That uses a REST architectural style.
PenguRESTClient(String, String, String) - Constructor for class pengu.messenger.PenguRESTClient
Parameterized constructor method that receives the API server's: address, access protocol, main directory, and endpoint.
PenguRESTClient.BadConnectionException - Exception in pengu.messenger
An exception for BadConnections.
PenguRESTClient.BadRequestException - Exception in pengu.messenger
An exception for Bad requests.
PenguRESTClient.ForbiddenException - Exception in pengu.messenger
An exception for Forbidden responses.
PenguRESTClient.NotFoundException - Exception in pengu.messenger
An exception for Not found responses.
PenguRESTClient.ServerErrorException - Exception in pengu.messenger
An exception for Server error responses.
PenguRESTClient.ServiceDownException - Exception in pengu.messenger
An exception for Service down responses.
PenguRESTClient.UnauthorisedException - Exception in pengu.messenger
An exception for Unauthorized responses.
pengusecurity.encrypt - package pengusecurity.encrypt
This package provides the cryptography classes required for End-End encryption.
PRIVATE_KEY - Static variable in class pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerRESTClient
The private key main directory.
PRIVATE_KEY_ADD - Static variable in class pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerRESTClient
The private key endpoint to request to add a private key.
PRIVATE_KEY_GET - Static variable in class pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerRESTClient
The private key endpoint to request for private keys.
PRIVATE_KEY_REQUEST_RECOVERY_KEY - Static variable in class pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerRESTClient
The private key endpoint to request for a recovery key.
PrivateKeyLink(String, String) - Constructor for class pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerClient.PrivateKeyLink
Parameterized constructor method that receives private key String and public key hash.
privateKeyToString() - Method in class pengusecurity.encrypt.PenguKeyPair
Converts the private key into a Base64 encoded String, to be used for exporting the private key.
PUBLIC_KEY - Static variable in class pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerRESTClient
The public key main directory.
PUBLIC_KEY_ADD - Static variable in class pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerRESTClient
The public key endpoint to request to add a public key.
PUBLIC_KEY_SEARCH_USERS - Static variable in class pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerRESTClient
The public key endpoint to request for user public keys.
PublicKey(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerRESTClient.PublicKey
Parameterized constructor method, that receives a public key, a username and expiry and registration dates of a public key.
publicKeyToString() - Method in class pengusecurity.encrypt.PenguKeyPair
Converts the public key into a Base64 encoded String, to be used for exporting the public key.
